statements: DELETE FROM IrisScanData WHERE verification_status = 'unverified' AND scan_timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 month'
DELETE FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE retrieval_time > 0.5 AND query_performance ILIKE 'high%';
DELETE FROM iris_scan_data WHERE verification_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = uuid_generate_v4() AND action = 'login';
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE query_time > 0.5 AND query_cost < 1000;
DELETE FROM QueryHistory WHERE user_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM QueryHistory WHERE user_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM performance_logs WHERE device_id = 'c3c3b294-0768-4d6b-8549-2d5ff0611ab5' AND processing_time > 1000;
